metadata.title: CVE-2020-12802 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: LibreOffice has a 'stealth mode' in which only documents from locationsdeemed 'trusted' are allowed to retrieve remote resources. This mode is notthe default mode, but can be enabled by users who want to disableLibreOffice's ability to include remote resources within a document. A flawexisted where remote graphic links loaded from docx documents were omittedfrom this protection prior to version 6.4.4. This issue affects: TheDocument Foundation LibreOffice versions prior to 6.4.4.

criterions.comment: libreoffice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
